formatted_address: 3 Simei Street 6, #01-K4, Eastpoint Mall, 3 Simei Street 6, #01-K4, Singapore 528833
name: Starbucks East Point Mall

reviews.text: Went there today and ordered one Soya latte and one vanilla latte. Vanilla latte came as just latte. When told staff they just put a shot of vanilla essence. No apologies. Secondly I don't see any effort in up selling. 3 staff,  all look busy but cafe not busy. Very flat experience

Honestly I didn‚Äôt really want to be that person but the service I seen from the 2 ladies were uncalled for. I was just trying to order a drink but the ladies were visibly annoyed to take order. The lady with the black apron took my order and was really reluctant to take it. It was as if I did something wrong and she was just unhappy that she has to do her job.

Although I rated 2 stars, I‚Äôd like to rate a 5 star for the male staff that had to fix all the drinks on his own while the 2 ladies chat away. They DID NOT offer any help at all. I could tell that he had been working away alone by the way they are not communicating. I for one do not tolerate workplace bullying so I hope this is not it.

Please do something about it.

Starbucks is living to its mission: to inspire and nurture the human spirit ‚Äì one person, one cup and one neighborhood at a time. I have always enjoyed patronising at this outlet for meetings and some quiet time. The staff are always friendly and joyful. I am appreciative that some of them even remember my name.
